other_tests.procedure_name: CT abdomen and pelvis with contrast
other_tests.findings: Diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon, stranding along the distal sigmoid consistent with acute diverticulitis, and an adjacent extraluminal fluid collection measuring 2.9 x 3 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Several prominent lymph nodes noted, not present on the prior study, largest measuring 12 mm in short axis diameter.
